alert.note: Alert for Cass; Fulton; White (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 8:38PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern White, southwestern Fulton and Cass Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 838 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles northwest of Mexico to near Logansport to 7 miles southwest of Royal Center. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Logansport, Royal Center, Burnettsville, Onward, Clymers, New Waverly, Leases Corner, Twelve Mile, Metea, Grass Creek, Hoover, Fletcher, Adamsboro, Lucerne, Bell Center, Lake Cicott and Anoka. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
